question: Which International organization has celebrated the 2nd edition of International Day of Light (IDL-2019)?
explanation: The United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization (UNESCO)  has celebrated the 2nd edition of International Day of Light (IDL-2019) on 16th May to mark the role light plays in our daily lives.  IDL aims to raise awareness of the critical role light-based technologies play in our lives, elevating science, technology, art, and culture to help achieve the goals of UNESCO â€“ education, equality, and peace. The day marks the anniversary of the first successful operation of the laser beam in 1960 by famous physicist and engineer - Theodore Maiman.
